body.name: Lulive Dresser for Bedroom with 12 Drawers, Tall Dresser Chest of Drawers with Side Pockets and Hooks, Fabric Dresser Storage Tower for Closet, Hallway, Living Room (Rustic Brown)
features: 12 Drawers Dresser & Ample Storage Space: Roomy capacity with 12 deep drawers help you sort items by type, also space-saving organization. 3 different sizes of drawer chests are great for organizing your clothes, blankets, scarves, socks, and others.

Upgraded & Side Pockets & Hooks: Small design, big convenience, our side pocket hooks of the bedroom dresser redefine convenience! which allows you to hang small items such as keys, phones, glasses, scarves, and more, keeping them visible and easily accessible.

Quality Construction: Compact drawers dresser features a sturdy steel frame and durable wood top, providing reliable strength and stability. Meanwhile, the tall dresser with an X rack at the back also has anti-tipping accessories for Safe Choice. 4 adjustable plastic feet help protect your floor from scratches.

Fashionable & Practical: The modern design storage dresser is made with a high-quality fabric mix of cationic material, durable and not easily fading. It can be paired with a variety of room styles to become the focal point of your living space.

Easy Assembly and & Friendly Customer Service: The understandable assembly instructions can help you easily assemble the 12-drawer dresser within just 20 minutes. If you have any questions about the Lulive chest of drawers, please feel free to contact us, your satisfaction is our first priority.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like the photo
reviews.reviewText: Looks amazing! It’s very sturdy, the fabric drawers are thick and will hold shape very well. Putting it together was fairly easy as well. Highly recommend this if you’re looking!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my son for his first apartment. He said it was easy to put together and it holds his clothes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product but..
reviews.reviewText: I love that this dresser it's easy to assemble, affordable, and doesn't take up much space. However, our top right drawer does not fit. It's too tall! We have two of these exact same dressers in other rooms in our house and didn't have an issue with those drawers. I'm thinking there was some mix up with sizing in the warehouse. You can see that its too tall in the picture above. Other than that, I 100% recommend buying it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price!
reviews.reviewText: We needed a last minute dresser for a baby nursery and this was perfect. Easy to assemble & looks nice for the low price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a nursery
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my daughter’s room. I originally thought it was a regular dresser but come to find out it’s not, but honestly this works for what we need it and it is not heavy so moving it is easy. I really like this and quality seems to be good haven’t had any issues with it also doesn’t dig into the carpet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Flimsy, small drawers
reviews.reviewText: The drawers are very small and quite flimsy. There were multiple screws missing but luckily i had some at home that worked fine as replacements. i’m confident that there are better dressers for the same price or possibly cheaper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great , lightweight
reviews.reviewText: Love it .. goes with the rest of the furniture and is lightweight which is perfect for small people to move

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bottom Line, I would not purchase again. See the full review for reasons.
reviews.reviewText: It wasn’t clear to me that the term Fabric Dresser meant that the drawers were constructed from fabric. There is no wood in the drawers. They are made from cardboard sandwiched in between two pieces of fabric. The only wood in this dresser is the top shelf. The sides do not have a wood panel. There is no panel on the side. What you see is the side of the fabric drawers. The reason that all of the photos depicted show the sleeves is to hide the sight of the bare shelves. If you note, in some photos the sleeves are on the right, and in others, they are on the left. They are either a mirror image of the shelf. Since the sleeves go on the left. Or they reversed the right and left vertical end pieces during assembly in order to put the sleeves on the right-hand side. Which means that they were intentionally deceptive.If you decide to purchase this anyway, be careful during the assembly. As some others have pointed out, it is easy to attach the vertical supports backwards. There is no labelling for front or back. The only way to know which is which is to look at the drawer railings. The back of the unit will have a little upright drawer stop tab. But, the vertical piece can be attached either direction. Resulting in the stop tab being at the front. Making it impossible to insert the drawer. Absent the fact that I had to detach and reattach three different supports since I didn’t notice the tab issue, the assembly was fairly easy.As you can see in my photos, one of the drawer heights don’t match the height of the support pieces. So, there is a gap. Also, the lower center small drawer will not slide in and out. Currently, it is more for show than for anything else.We have not put any substantial weight yet in any of the drawers. So, I can’t speak about the drawer integrity as of this moment.Bottom line? The maxim still holds. You get what you pay for.
